title: A sheet of insulating plastic material is inser...

content.question: A sheet of insulating plastic material is inserted between the plates without otherwise disturbing the system. What effect does this have on the capacitance?

choices.label: It causes the capacitance to increase.
It causes the capacitance to decrease.
None; the capacitance does not change.
Nothing can be said about the effect without knowing the dielectric constant of the plastic.
Nothing can be said about the effect without knowing the thickness of the sheet.

content.answer: It causes the capacitance to increase.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
